sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Diffutils package contains the cmp, diff, diff3 and sdiff programs.

sect3.title: cmp and diff
sect3.para: cmp and diff both compare two files and report their differences. Both programs have extra options which compare files in different situations.

sect3.title: diff3
sect3.para: The difference between diff and diff3 is that diff compares 2 files, diff3 compares 3 files.

sect3.title: sdiff
sect3.para: sdiff merges two files and interactively outputs the results.
